topics.body:
"@toxicrystal":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55557b706368721993ba0800#post_55557b706368721993ba0800
You mean necrosis? I'm not sure if banana spider venom can actually cause necrosis. I know the Brown Recluse can. Just ask my aunt.
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

topics.body:
"@toxicrystal":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55557b706368721993ba0800#post_55557b706368721993ba0800

topics.author: 4fe3df367f123b517900066a

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55557bc663687271d71b2a00#post_55557bc663687271d71b2a00
No, it's not necrosis.
When I say they melt it, I'm not fucking around. They seriously do.

EDIT: Okay, _maybe_ it's necrosis.
topics.author: 5201b5c0a4c72d0d9b0001e4

topics.body:
"@toxicrystal":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55557b706368721993ba0800#post_55557b706368721993ba0800
I was right. Banana Spider venom is a neurotoxin. It basically shuts down you cardio and nervous system. Whereas the brown recluse contains a hemotoxin which affects your flow of blood and destroys your red blood cells.

*Spider nerd away!*
